name: ReturnState
description: Neon is a busy guy, but if your world is under siege and you've got the coin, he'll return things to the way they were. ReturnState is a sci-fi themed action platformer with gameplay inspired by 2D classics like Castlevania, Sonic, and Super Mario Bros. Expect to run, jump, and slash waves of enemies. The game can be played in various retro graphical styles. Future features: more retro styles, game cheats, and more secrets.
